articles.description: Saim Ayub is one of the most exciting young talents in Pakistan cricket and every time he gets going, he is a treat to watch. In the 25th match of PSL 2024 between Peshawar Zalmi and Quetta Gladiators, he was again off to a flier and scored 30 off just 12 bal…
articles.content:

articles.title: ICC joins forces with LA28, Flag Football, Lacrosse, Softball & Squash to celebrate International Women's Day - ICC Cricket
articles.description: ICC collaborated with the four other new Olympic sports on the occasion of International Women’s Day 2024.
articles.content:
